title: Florida Tranquil Beachfront Resort near Miami
description: Surrounded by oceanfront mansions and luxury yachts with a secluded patch of sun-kissed shoreline, Hillsboro Beach Resort is the ultimate oasis for a luxe retreat. The only resort on the intimate Hillsboro Mile peninsula, this retreat is the perfect spot to explore some of the many outdoor activities on offer in the area: try your hand at paddleboarding and kayaking, grab a bicycle for a ride, spy a free telescope to see the skies or simply roll out a towel and relax on the golden sands. Plus, Hillsboro Beach Resort is just a short drive from Fort Lauderdale's premier shopping and entertainment destinations, Las Olas Boulevard and Mizner Park.
